channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Wings Over Walls: Tearing Down The 20% Barrier
channel.desc: At top-ranked Univ. of Tokyo, where only 20% of students are female, many women have had their "wings" clipped. Through the university's history, we confront deep-rooted issues in Japanese society.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dosukoi Sumo Salon
channel.desc: Though rarely seen, pulling throws are often used in clutch moments that inspire the reaction "So good!" Our search for the technique's roots leads us to a fishing town with a long sumo tradition.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: In the 19th century, Japan opened its doors. The "Kimono Dress" - emblematic of a broader clothing revolution - sheds light on Japan's forward-looking strategy as it joined the global community.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design ? Stories
channel.desc: Today's theme: Design Hunting in Ishikawa. The traditional culture of Ishikawa prefecture is reflected in its diverse arts and crafts. Join us on a design hunt in a region recovering from disaster.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Texico
channel.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Train Cruise
channel.desc: Late April, spring has arrived in northern Japan. Travel the JR Ou and Gono Lines, discovering cherry blossoms, hiking a lush beech forest, soaking in a seaside spring and trying fermented soybeans.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Droughts are increasing and simulations predict that megadroughts could occur in the future. Discover Japan's technology that could solve water scarcity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: U&i
channel.desc: This show for kids promotes a greater understanding for people with difficulties and helps develop empathy. With the help of two fairies, the main character thinks about what can be done to help.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Japanology Plus Mini
channel.desc: Women-only trips and solo camping are some of the many ways that people enjoy camping in Japan. Camping can even serve as a method of preparing for disaster. We examine its increasing popularity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Time And Tide
channel.desc: In the 19th century, Japan opened its doors. The "Kimono Dress" - emblematic of a broader clothing revolution - sheds light on Japan's forward-looking strategy as it joined the global community.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Core Kyoto Mini
channel.desc: In summer, children gather at the street corners where Jizo statues stand for lively festivities. People pray for the health and success of their children during this cornerstone of faith.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ethical Every Day
channel.desc: Rising temperatures are changing marine life. Sushi chains introduce unfamiliar fish, and researchers seek to breed species that can endure higher temperatures. This time, living with a warming sea.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Masterpieces Of Historic Capitals
channel.desc: Historic capitals in the Kansai region are home to a wealth of national treasures and masterpieces. In Osaka, we uncover exquisite works of art that reflect the elegance of aristocratic culture.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Wings Over Walls: Tearing Down The 20% Barrier
channel.desc: At top-ranked Univ. of Tokyo, where only 20% of students are female, many women have had their "wings" clipped. Through the university's history, we confront deep-rooted issues in Japanese society.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Dosukoi Sumo Salon
channel.desc: Though rarely seen, pulling throws are often used in clutch moments that inspire the reaction "So good!" Our search for the technique's roots leads us to a fishing town with a long sumo tradition.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Biz Stream
channel.desc: This upbeat program combines business and economic news with in-depth feature stories that give you a closer look at the latest trends within Japan and around the world.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Texico
channel.desc: Learn the principles of programming without a computer. Animated characters provide fun and lucid explanations of 5 core processes: analysis, combination, generalization, abstraction, and simulation.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Train Cruise
channel.desc: Late April, spring has arrived in northern Japan. Travel the JR Ou and Gono Lines, discovering cherry blossoms, hiking a lush beech forest, soaking in a seaside spring and trying fermented soybeans.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Bosai: Science That Can Save Your Life
channel.desc: Droughts are increasing and simulations predict that megadroughts could occur in the future. Discover Japan's technology that could solve water scarcity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cinematic Journey
channel.desc: Join our explorers as they pursue the cinematic beauty of Japan. Kyle Card hikes the newly designated long trail around majestic Mt. Fuji and discovers its secrets.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline
channel.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Little Charo
channel.desc: Little Charo is an animation series about a Japanese dog who got lost in NY. "I want to see my owner again!" Charo starts his adventure back home. Season 1-10.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: A Cat's Eye View Of Japan
channel.desc: Enjoy a warm kitty-welcome at the famous hot spring area! After visiting a popular cat duo at a ropeway station, stop by at a restaurant run by a kitty and its owner where you can also bathe.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Cycle Around Japan Highlights
channel.desc: On a 300km autumn trip through Miyagi, one of Japan's most beautiful regions, we visit coastal towns that have rebuilt their way of life in the time since the devastating 2011 earthquake.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Mitateru Phose: Let's Change Perspectives!
channel.desc: This program employs "mitateru," a Japanese technique, to inspire children's imagination by encouraging them to view objects differently and develop their unique perspectives and creativity.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Somewhere Street
channel.desc: Mayfair, a luxurious district in London, preserves the quintessence of British high tradition. Regarded as the city's most prestigious and desirous locale, it's beloved by the upper class and royalty.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Ekiben Japan
channel.desc: In Nagaoka, there's an ekiben shaped by layers of tradition, featuring chicken meatballs with local chili, 100-year-old abura-age, thrice-pickled eggplants in miso and more, each with their own story.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Easy Japanese For Work
channel.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Nhk Newsline

channel.name: NHK World JP
channel.title: Design Ah Neo
channel.desc: Design is fun! Design feels good! Cutting-edge images and music guide children to enjoy exploring the ideas and tweaks in the designs all around us. An episode on Escape Routes.
